hero.title: Together we build a new meaning of life
hero.description: At Al Apex, we create real estate projects that combine comfort, prime locations, and modern design. Whether you're looking for a home, an investment, or a vacation escape, your perfect property starts here.

Footer.companyDescription: نحن نقدم حلولاً احترافية في التسويق والاستثمار العقاري في الإسكندرية، ونسعى لمساعدة العملاء في إيجاد أفضل الفرص من خلال المعرفة المحلية والتوجيه الاستراتيجي.
Footer.address: الطابق الأول، جرين بلازا مول، سموحة – أمام مكتب الشهر العقاري، الإسكندرية، مصر

About_Us.whoWeAreText: Apex Real Estate Investment is a leading company in real estate marketing and investment based in Alexandria, Egypt. We offer specialized experience and comprehensive solutions for both residential and commercial projects.
About_Us.point1: Comprehensive local market coverage in Alexandria.
About_Us.point2: Strategic partnerships and modern marketing techniques.
About_Us.point3: Building long-term trusted relationships with our clients.
About_Us.point4: Continuous expansion across various sectors and projects.
About_Us.visionText: We aspire to be the leading choice for real estate investment and marketing in Alexandria by offering a transparent, innovative experience.
About_Us.service1: Marketing and selling residential and commercial properties.
About_Us.service2: Investment consultancy based on market analysis.
About_Us.service3: Legal support and assistance in contracts and negotiations.
About_Us.address: Amin Hassouna Street, Syouf, Alexandria – Next to Carrefour City Light

contactDetails.title: Contact Information
contactDetails.address: First floor, in front of the Real Estate Registry
contactDetails.workingHours: Every day from 10 AM to 12 midnight
